properties.title: Coffee & Chat

properties.description: Everyone is welcome We are a community cafe open 9.30-4pm everyday. We provide a full hot and cold lunch menu until 2pm, with drinks and cakes provided after. We have a system to provide our menu for free to anyone in need - order your food and ask for the Marble Jar to pay. Everyone is welcome to stay as long as they need. There are also power points if you need to plug your phone or laptop in and work.
properties.title: Cornerstone Christian Centre

properties.description: Public library opposite the Old Mill Hall
properties.title: Grove Library

properties.description: The cost of living crisis is impacting many people who are having to make difficult decisions between food or fuel. Lambourn is a rural community built up around the racehorse training industry with limited public transport to the nearest town which is 9 miles away. The Lambourn Lunch Club provides a safe, warm place to meet and have a free meal for those who are impacted by the cost of living and rural isolation. We carefully analysed the benefits to the community before starting the Lambourn lunch club and the feedback to date has been very positive indeed. If you would like to join us for a meal and a chat next week, please give Helen a call 07770 394 123 to book a place. No pressure, no judgement just good company and a delicious hot meal followed by tea and coffee.
properties.title: Lambourn Lunch Club

properties.description: Space open to all. Children need to be accompanied
